articles.title: San Diego County would be in most restrictive tier in state’s former COVID reopening system - FOX 5 San Diego
articles.description: If California were still using its tier-based blueprint for lifting coronavirus restrictions, San Diego County and 16 others would now be in the most restrictive purple tier.
